title: JavaScript Level 2 â€” Variables & Operators
concept: Use variables, arithmetic operators and console.log to display results.

challenges.title: Multiply Two Numbers
challenges.description: Read two integers a and b from input and print their product a * b.
challenges.inputDescription: Two integers a and b separated by space.
challenges.outputDescription: Single integer: the product of a and b.

challenges.title: Remainder of Division
challenges.description: Read two integers a and b and print the remainder when a is divided by b (a % b).
challenges.inputDescription: Two integers a and b separated by space.
